title: Beef and vegetable pie
ingredients: ['1 large onion, chopped', '1/2 punnet mushrooms', '250g mince beef', '2 teaspoons mixed herbs', '130g frozen peas', '1 small jar baby carrots', '1 beef stock cube', 'For the pastry', '250g flour', '125g suet', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '2-3 sprigs rosemary', '1 egg, beaten']
